sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A sermon preached at Westminster before the King and Queenes Maiesties, at their coronations on Saint Iames his day, being the 28. of Iuly. 1603. By the Reuerend Father in God, the Lord Bishop of Winchester Bilson, Thomas, 1546 or 7-1616.
[48] p.
By V[alentine] S[immes] for Clement Knight, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Holy Lambe, Printed at London : 1603.
Lord Bishop of Winchester = Thomas Bilson. Printer's name from STC. Signatures: A-C. The first leaf is blank except for a large signature-mark "A". Running title reads: A sermon preached at the coronation. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

[48] p.
By V[alentine] S[immes] for Clement Knight, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Holy Lambe, Printed at London : 1603.
Lord Bishop of Winchester = Thomas Bilson. Printer's name from STC. Signatures: A-C. The first leaf is blank except for a large signature-mark "A". Running title reads: A sermon preached at the coronation. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Clement Knight
V[alentine] S[immes]
his shop at the signe of the Holy Lambe
